summary: 1995  was a common year starting on Sunday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: The President of Somalia  is the head of state of Somalia. There have been 8 official presidents since the office was created in 1960. The first President of the Somali Republic was Aden Abdullah Osman Daar. The incumbent President of the Federal Government of Somalia is Hassan Sheikh Mohamud.
title: President of Somalia
